short_summary: Reusable water barrier systems for environmental practice
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on 2024-05-29 by 2:00 PM EDT. All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide the supply, delivery, and training of reusable and refillable water barrier systems to be used on flat ground and in rivers, streams, and wetlands to enable safe and environmentally friendly practices when installing, replacing, or remediating culvert systems around Garrison Petawawa and within the Training Area (TA) to Real Property Operations Unit (RPOU) - Detachment Petawawa.
